text: Deroplatys cordata is a species of praying mantis in the genus Deroplatys in the order Mantodea.[/12603 Tree of Life Web Project. 2005 This "dead leaf mantis" species is native to Southeast Asia. ==See also== * * List of mantis genera and species ==References== corodata Category:Mantodea of Southeast Asia Category:Insects described in 1798
title: Deroplatys cordata
